title: Unveiled: With Yasmine Mohammed
description:
In this episode I have the privilege of interviewing the incredible Yasmine Mohammed. We speak about her book "Unveiled", where she outlines the challenges she and many other women have faced growing up female in Islam.We also discuss her work advocating for women still under oppression today, and the the pushback she has received from both the left and the right. Do yourself a favour and buy her book!

Listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Unveiled-With-Yasmine-Mohammed-e9gpd5

Check out her organization Free Hearts, Free Minds here: https://www.freeheartsfreeminds.com

Follow here on Twitter @YasMohammed
Follow me @AndreaLynnLewis
